quizzes.question: What does the 'useEffect' Hook do in React?
quizzes.a: Handles the rendering of the component
quizzes.c: Lets you perform side effects in function components

quizzes.question: What is a higher-order component in React?
quizzes.a: A component that renders another component
quizzes.b: A function that takes a component and returns a new component
quizzes.c: A class that inherits from another class
quizzes.d: A pattern used for reusing component logic

quizzes.d: Forms cannot be handled in React

quizzes.question: What does MVC stand for, and why is it important?

quizzes.b: Most Valuable Component, a technique to identify key components in an application
quizzes.c: Model Visual Control, a graphical user interface
quizzes.d: Multiple Virtual Containers, a tool for containerization

quizzes.a: To enhance the security of the applications
quizzes.c: To package an application with all of its dependencies

quizzes.d: To make the website compatible with older browsers
